definitions.text: witty language used to convey insults or scorn; ; ; --Jonathan Swift
examples: he used sarcasm to upset his opponent
irony is wasted on the stupid
Satire is a sort of glass, wherein beholders do generally discover everybody's face but their own

definitions.text: incongruity between what might be expected and what actually occurs
examples: the irony of Ireland's copying the nation she most hated

definitions.text: a trope that involves incongruity between what is expected and what occurs
